SEARCH
Package leave

Class Leave

java.lang.Object
leave.Leave
public class Leave extends Object
The Leave class represents a leave request in the system.

It contains details about the leave request, including the leave ID, staff member requesting the leave, the date of the leave, the status of the leave, and the reason for the leave.

This class provides methods to access and modify leave details, format leave information for display, and convert leave data to CSV format.

    • Leave

      public Leave(String leaveID, User staff, LocalDate date, LeaveStatus status, String reason)
      Constructs a leave request with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      leaveID - The unique identifier for the leave request.
      staff - The User who requested the leave.
      date - The LocalDate of the leave.
      status - The LeaveStatus indicating the status of the leave.
      reason - The reason provided for the leave.
